entry.title: Local Reputation to Mitigate Slow Jamming
entry.summary: In a group discussion, Vincent suggests that they should understand the benefits of continuous solutions over binary before making any decisions. Another participant agrees with him and proposes that they define local reputation practically and experiment with how local metrics are evaluated in a real environment with a real Lightning Network node. Vincent thinks that they should have the necessary tools to conduct this analysis by now.
